okay so apparently editing is disabled.  

I am the author of this torrent, and will continue to seed but keep in mind my connection has poor upload speeds.

If anyone has a copy of the teachers soln manual and wants to combine them that would be cool.

I removed the drm on this pdf so i could put it on my ereader / laptop  hope you guys like it.
Thank you for this wonderful book in color with excellent examples.

okay i am approaching a ratio of 15 now, i will stop seeding soon. GL to all, and if you wish to bitch about not having any seeders, you will know its because people just DL and bounced without seeding their fair shares.
Please, please, please seed this! I'm stuck at 77% and not going anywhere anytime fast :( Promise I'll seed for as long as I can after I get it totally downloaded! (As should others!)
Finally got it, I'll be seeding for a while! Thanks so much uploader, you saved this poor college student a couple hundred bucks!
Can someone PLEASE seed this? I am really getting nowhere. It's been hours.
